00023 class PortHeaderInformation : public Linkable <PortHeaderInformation>
00024 {
00025     public:
00026         PortHeaderInformation(Tpdu *tpdu = 0);
00027         virtual ~PortHeaderInformation();
00028 
00030         const PhoneNumber&  GetPhoneNumber() const { return m_phnr; }
00032         UINT16 GetConcRefNo() const { return m_conc_ref_no; }
00034         UINT8 GetConcMaxNo() const { return m_conc_max_no; }
00036         UINT8 GetConcSeqNo() const { return m_conc_seq_no; }
00038         SmsPortNo GetSmsOriginatorPortNo() const { return m_sms_orig_port_no; }
00040         SmsPortNo GetSmsDestinationPortNo() const { return m_sms_dest_port_no; }
00042         UINT8 GetPayloadSize() const { return m_payload_size; }
00044         UINT8* GetPayloadData() const { return m_payload_data; }
00045 
00047         BOOLEAN HasSmsPortNo() const { return m_sms_dest_port_no != InvalidSmsPortNo; }
00049         BOOLEAN IsConcateneted() const { return m_is_concateneted; }
00050 
00051     private:

00053         UINT8 m_conc_seq_no;
00054         UINT8 m_payload_size;
00055         UINT8 m_payload_offset;
